strapiPost.title: Welcoming Week Begins Today
strapiPost.content:
With days of events inspired by Welcoming America, Northwest Arkansas is participating in Welcoming Week, which officially starts today! 

  • Purpose: Welcoming Week NWA is presented by Engage NWA and will bring the community together to affirm the importance of welcoming and inclusive places in the mission of collective prosperity. 
  • Events: To kick off the week, there is a launch and community opening celebration at The Jones Center, coffee and treats for all at Experience Fayetteville, a patio concert series at Bike Rack Brewing, a movie screening at Thaden, and more, all today! 

Click HERE for the full calendar of Welcoming Week NWA events.
